problem: 如图,以BC为直径的半圆中,点A、D在半圆周上且AD=DC,若∠ABC=30°,则∠ADC的度数为()
answer: 解:由圆内接四边形的对角互补知,∠D=180°-∠B=150°,故选D．
comment: 本题利用了圆内接四边形的性质:对角互补．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the semicircle with BC as the diameter, points A and D are on the semicircle and AD = DC, if ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
